<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Assignments">d86858672f101110da77c886f699b6d4</macroponent><name>Unassign worker from MSP modal</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    // Called from MSP modal (manage shift position)
	console.log('api.item.value:');
	console.log(api.item.value);
	api.item.value.unassigned = !api.item.value.unassigned;
    /*var workerClicked = api.state.manage_shift_position_options.workers.find(wkr => {
		return wkr.label == api.item.value.label; //Todo: Use worker id
	});
	workerClicked.unassigned = !workerClicked.unassigned;*/

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-30 19:42:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>44ccd9a247187d102dabcd9bd36d432f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Unassign worker from MSP modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Eyva" source="x_802331_eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_44ccd9a247187d102dabcd9bd36d432f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-30 19:55:44</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
